Start Blogging

Jun 26, 2016

An attempt to blog!

After being frustated from merging thermal commits for kernel_apq8064 from different sources, I thought I give blogging a try. I am having holiday season, so instead of going easy pre-built editor ones I used Jekyll. Plus, it’s awesome.

You can read the whole documentation @Jekyll docs. If you gave it a try and found something buggy, then file them here @Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
